resources.string: Tool that should hopefully, eventually make it slightly easier to share Switch screenshots/clips by automating the send to phone process or something like that
Press + (\'Trouble Connecting?\') to find the following details.\nNote that the password will change each time.\nThe SSID will stay the same for each Switch and the app will save it.
The scanned code does not seem to be for a Wifi network
The SSID (Wifi name) should start with \'switch_\'.\nLong-press the connect button to bypass this check
The password should be 8 characters long.\nLong-press the connect button to bypass this check
You need to put in a SSID
You need to put in a password
